description.title: Stay on top of the hottest music
description.contents: These songs and artists are the cream of this month's crop of new music. Check out the latest from Taylor Swift, Old Dominion, Kesha, and Brett Young.

description.head: FAST, FREE DELIVERY
description.title: Fast, FREE delivery on over 100 milion items
description.contents: Super-fast delivery, tens of milions of items, and flexible delivery options to fit your life. Plus, Prime members get FREE One-Day Delivery on tens of milions of items.

description.head: SAME-DAY DELIVERY
description.title: FREE Same-Day Delivery
description.contents: Prime members get FREE Same-Day Delivery on over three million items with qualifying orders.

description.head: RELEASE DAY DELEVERY
description.title: Skip the lines and get it on release day
description.contents: No more waiting in line! Choose Free Release-Date Delivery at checkout on qualified items, and your package will be delivered on the release day by 7pm.

description.head: PRIME NOW
description.title: Ultrafast delivery on thousands of items
description.contents: Prime Now offers household items and essentials you need everyday plus the best of Amazon, delivered to your doorstep. Choose 2-hour delivery or 1-hour delivery in select cities.

description.head: PRIME VIDEO
description.title: Watch movies, TV, live events, and more
description.contents: As a Prime member, you can watch exclusive Amazon Originals and thousands of popular movies and TV shows—all at no extra cost. Watch at home or on the go with practically any device.

description.head: TWITCH PRIME
description.title: Free Games & Loot with Twitch Prime
description.contents: Gamers can get free games, in-game items, a free Twitch channel subscription every month and more with Twitch Prime.

description.head: PRIME MUSIC
description.title: Millions of songs for every moment
description.contents: As a Prime member, you can stream over 2 million songs ad free, listen on any Echo device, and take your music anywhere with offline listening.

description.head: AMAZON ORIGINALS
description.title: Enjoy Amazon Original series and more
description.contents: Super-fast delivery, tens of milions of items, and flexible delivery options to fit your life. Plus, Prime members get FREE One-Day Delivery on tens of milions of items.

description.head: AUDIBLE CHANNELS
description.title: Original audio programs for life on the go
description.contents: Audible Channels are free with your Prime membership. Enjoy original audio series and playlists handcrafted for every interest. Just download the Audible app and start listening.

description.head: PRIME AT WHOLE FOODS MARKET
description.title: Our healthiest benefit yet
description.contents: Exclusive savings for Prime members in all US stores, 5% Back for eligible Prime members with the Amazon Prime Rewards Visa Card, and 2-hour delivery with Prime Now in select cities (more soon)

description.head: ALEXA VOICE SHOPPING
description.title: The simplest way to shop. Just ask Alexa.
description.contents: With Alexa, shopping for essentials and reordering your favorite items from Amazon has never been easier.
description.link-text: Learn more about Alexa and Prime

description.head: JUST WITH PRIME
description.title: Exclusive brands and deals available only to Prime members
description.contents: As a Prime member enjoy early access to deals, Prime exclusive brands, and savings.

description.head: AMAZON FAMILY
description.title: Save on supplies for the family
description.contents: Prime members save 20% off both diapers and baby food when they have 5 or more subscriptions arriving

description.head: RRIME READING
description.title: Prime members read free
description.contents: As a Prime member, you can now read as much as you like from over a thousand top Kindle books, magazines, short works, books with Audible narration, comics, children's books and more—all at no additional cost.

description.head: AMAZON FIRST READS
description.title: Read next month's new releases today
description.contents: Each month, Prime members can download one editors' pick for free--before the official publication date. Downloaded titles are yours to keep.
description.link-text: Learn more about Amazon First Reads

description.head: 5% BACK
description.title: Earn more with Prime Rewards
description.contents: Eligible Prime members can earn 5% back at Amazon.com using the Amazon Prime Rewards Visa Card or the Amazon Prime Store card. All Prime members earn 2% rewards with Amazon Prime Reload.

description.head: AMAZON PHOTOS
description.title: Unlimited, free photo storage
description.contents: Back up and share your photos with unlimited photo storage. Add your photos to the free app to see them on all your devices.
